com.igtv.audio

Class MidiPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igtv.audio.MidiPlayer

  • public class MidiPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Acts as a basic driver for playing MIDI audio for the user. Relies on Java's Sequence class for play/stop functionality.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean isPlaying 
      private javax.sound.midi.Sequencer sequencer 

    • Constructor Summary

      gets the length of a sequencer in MIDI ticks
      boolean isLoaded()
      Returns whether or not load(Sequence) was not already called.
      boolean isPlaying()
      Returns whether or not MIDI is being played by this object.
      boolean load(javax.sound.midi.Sequence sequence)
      Loads a MIDI sequence into the player using Sequencer.setSequence(Sequence)
      boolean play()
      Plays the specified MIDI file beginning at a given onset
      boolean seek(long onsetInTicks)
      Seeks to a specified onset (in MIDI ticks).

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public boolean load(javax.sound.midi.Sequence sequence)
        Loads a MIDI sequence into the player using Sequencer.setSequence(Sequence)
        Parameters:
        sequence -
        Returns:

      • play

        public boolean play()
        Plays the specified MIDI file beginning at a given onset
        Returns:
        Boolean representing whether or not the play command was successfully executed

      • isLoaded

        public boolean isLoaded()
        Returns whether or not load(Sequence) was not already called. This is found by checking if the sequencer object is null or not.
        Returns:
        Boolean representing whether or not load(Sequence) was not already called.

      • seek

        public boolean seek(long onsetInTicks)
        Seeks to a specified onset (in MIDI ticks). This may be called during playback or while stopped. The only requirement is that a track is required to have been loaded before being called.
        Parameters:
        onsetInTicks - The desired onset (measured in MIDI ticks)
        Returns:
        Boolean representing whether the seek was successful.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops any audio that is playing.
        Parameters:
        onset - Onset where audio should begin playing.

      • getTickPosition

        public long getTickPosition()
        gets the current tick position of sequencer
        Returns:
        long current tick position of sequencer /** Returns the position (in ticks) of playback. Helpful for implementing pause functionality.

      • getTotalTickLength

        public long getTotalTickLength()
        gets the length of a sequencer in MIDI ticks
        Returns:
        long length of sequencer in MIDI ticks

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns whether or not MIDI is being played by this object.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the player is actively playing a score
